job_overview:
Assist and follow up on company formation processes in Dubai

???? Requirements:

Minimum 2 years of experience as a virtual assistant or administrative support
Excellent spoken and written English
Strong attention to detail, time management, and task ownership
Familiarity with business registration processes (UAE experience is a plus)
Professional communication skills and ability to work independently
Tech-savvy (Google Workspace, Trello, Notion, etc.)
